ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: Freya Shearer kindly provided data on vaccine coverage estimates. We thank the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency, whose funding provided the opportunity to discuss and develop this project at a workshop on pathogen spillover. We also thank the authors of many previous studies who have made their data available, and we are grateful for the publicly available remote sensing data that made this project possible. The manuscript was improved by comments from anonymous reviewers.
